meanings.definition: A soothing ointment or balm used to relieve pain or promote healing.
meanings.sent1: She applied a salve to her sunburn to ease the pain.
meanings.sent2: The herbal salve helped heal the cut on his finger.
meanings.sent3: The salve worked like magic on her chapped lips.
meanings.sent4: His kind words were a salve to her wounded heart.
meanings.sent5: The cooling salve brought instant relief to his sore muscles.

meanings.definition: To soothe or heal with a salve.
meanings.sent1: He tried to salve her hurt feelings with an apology.
meanings.sent2: The nurse gently salved the patient's burns with a soothing cream.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to salve the situation only made it worse.
meanings.sent4: Her comforting words salved his worried mind.
meanings.sent5: The apology was meant to salve the tension between them.
